content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Furnace at position(5.0, 5.0)
Utilized to convert iron ore and coal into iron plates. The agent interacted with this furnace by inserting resources and extracting iron plates.

### Copper Smelting Furnace at position(-27.0, -60.0)
Employed to process copper ore and coal into copper plates. The agent used this structure during copper plate production to support subsequent processing activities.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Parameter Errors:
 – Avoid using unsupported keyword arguments with get_entities (e.g. “radius”). Follow the API’s signature to prevent unexpected keyword or positional argument errors.

• Lab Placement and Crafting Failures:
 – Before placing a Lab at a specified position (0.5, 2.5), confirm that a Lab exists in inventory.
 – When crafting a Lab, ensure that all required sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic circuits, and copper cables) are available and that the necessary production facilities (like furnaces for smelting base materials) are operational.

• None Iteration Handling:
 – Verify that functions returning entity lists do not yield None before attempting to iterate over the results.
